title: Shareaholic
shortDescription: Get the best results on social media and SEO.
longDescription:
The Ultimate Social Media Toolkit for your Website


The goal of your site is to receive visitors and to convert them into customers, users, loyalists, fans, leads, and so on. We're here to help you do that. Shareaholic gives you the best tools you need to grow your website. Award winning, very easy to use, professional grade. Start driving results for FREE.

Shareaholic platform includes:

* Optimized Social Sharing Buttons App: Instantly add optimized sharing buttons to your desktop and mobile experience. Choose from different places to share such as Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Amazon Wishlist, Houzz, Wanelo, Fancy, Reddit, Buffer, Evernote, Instapaper, Pocket, Tumblr. Includes SMS sharing and WhatsApp sharing. Shareaholic Share Buttons feature [Share Count Recovery](https://blog.shareaholic.com/recover-social-share-counts-https/) functionality. This setting is for anyone who has had to go through the pain and toil of updating their permalink structure or changing over from HTTP to HTTPS and thereby losing all of their social share counts. No more! All your hard work and social proof will, again, be fully accounted for with this feature. * Image sharing App: Get more shares and viral traffic by adding smart share buttons to the images on your website and making them easy to share. By making it easy for your visitors to share their favorite images from your store on Pinterest, we're helping you unlock a major source of valuable traffic that many sites aren't even pursuing yet. * Follow Buttons App: Get more followers and grow your social influence. Supported services include Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, YouTube, Google+, LinkedIn, SlideShare, Instagram, VK, RSS feed, Github, Stackoverflow, Dribbble, Behance, 500px, iTunes, Houzz, Flickr, Foursquare, Yelp, Bloglovin, Etsy, TripAdvisor, About.me, Polyvore, Soundcloud, eBay, Skype, Zillow, Disqus, Spotify, Feedly, LiveJournal, Better Business Bureau (BBB). * Related Content / Products App: Increase engagement and time on site by highlighting relevant content & products that may not otherwise be discovered from across your store. Choose from several themes to match your site’s design or customize your own. Great for SEO. * Monetization Apps: There are several advertising and monetization options available, and your audience niche, traffic volume, and visitor behavior will determine which options are the best for your particular website. Try different revenue-generating apps, see which ones make you money, and easily turn off any that don’t. * Analytics App: Provides you with important actionable metrics including insights into popular pages on your site, referral channels, etc. You'll also be able to track the "humanness" of your audience and rank authors. A must have for any blog with multiple authors. * Cookie Consent Prompt App: This app adds a banner on your site giving consent compliance of European Cookies Law.

Tightly Integrated with Google

Shareaholic is officially integrated with Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager and Google URL Shortener. We have worked closely with Google to ensure that Shareaholic has the best possible integrations with Google tools you use and love. Shareaholic also has many more official integrations with Bitly (custom URL shortener), Buffer, Hootsuite, etc.

You'll be in Great Company

Shareaholic has been in business since 2009 and is trusted by hundreds of thousands of websites (small and large). Featured by the New York Times, MIT Technology Review, The Washington Post, The BBC, TechCrunch, Forbes, Entrepreneur...
instructions: If you already have a Shareaholic account, please log in and we will present a list of your sites for you to choose from here. If not, please sign up and we will setup your site during the installation process.
author: Shareaholic Inc.

categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

We have worked closely with Google to ensure that Shareaholic has the best possible integrations with Google tools you use and love. Shareaholic also has many more official integrations with Bitly (custom URL shortener), Buffer, Hootsuite, etc.

You'll be in Great Company

Shareaholic has been in business since 2009 and is trusted by hundreds of thousands of websites (small and large). Featured by the New York Times, MIT Technology Review, The Washington Post, The BBC, TechCrunch, Forbes, Entrepreneur...

siteId.title: Your Shareaholic Site ID

proposedApp.title: Shareaholic
proposedApp.shortDescription: Get better results on social media and SEO.
proposedApp.longDescription:
The Ultimate Social Media Toolkit for your Website


The goal of your site is to receive visitors and to convert them into customers, users, loyalists, fans, leads, and so on. We're here to help you do that. Shareaholic gives you the best tools you need to grow your website. Award winning, very easy to use, professional grade. Start driving results for FREE.

Shareaholic platform includes:

* Optimized Social Sharing Buttons App: Instantly add optimized sharing buttons to your desktop and mobile experience. Choose from different places to share such as Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Amazon Wishlist, Houzz, Wanelo, Fancy, Reddit, Buffer, Evernote, Instapaper, Pocket, Tumblr. Includes SMS sharing and WhatsApp sharing. Shareaholic Share Buttons feature [Share Count Recovery](https://blog.shareaholic.com/recover-social-share-counts-https/) functionality. This setting is for anyone who has had to go through the pain and toil of updating their permalink structure or changing over from HTTP to HTTPS and thereby losing all of their social share counts. No more! All your hard work and social proof will, again, be fully accounted for with this feature. * Image sharing App: Get more shares and viral traffic by adding smart share buttons to the images on your website and making them easy to share. By making it easy for your visitors to share their favorite images from your store on Pinterest, we're helping you unlock a major source of valuable traffic that many sites aren't even pursuing yet. * Follow Buttons App: Get more followers and grow your social influence. Supported services include Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, YouTube, Google+, LinkedIn, SlideShare, Instagram, VK, RSS feed, Github, Stackoverflow, Dribbble, Behance, 500px, iTunes, Houzz, Flickr, Foursquare, Yelp, Bloglovin, Etsy, TripAdvisor, About.me, Polyvore, Soundcloud, eBay, Skype, Zillow, Disqus, Spotify, Feedly, LiveJournal, Better Business Bureau (BBB). * Related Content / Products App: Increase engagement and time on site by highlighting relevant content & products that may not otherwise be discovered from across your store. Choose from several themes to match your site’s design or customize your own. Great for SEO. * Monetization Apps: There are several advertising and monetization options available, and your audience niche, traffic volume, and visitor behavior will determine which options are the best for your particular website. Try different revenue-generating apps, see which ones make you money, and easily turn off any that don’t. * Analytics App: Provides you with important actionable metrics including insights into popular pages on your site, referral channels, etc. You'll also be able to track the "humanness" of your audience and rank authors. A must have for any blog with multiple authors. * Cookie Consent Prompt App: This app adds a banner on your site giving consent compliance of European Cookies Law.

Tightly Integrated with Google

Shareaholic is officially integrated with Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager and Google URL Shortener. We have worked closely with Google to ensure that Shareaholic has the best possible integrations with Google tools you use and love. Shareaholic also has many more official integrations with Bitly (custom URL shortener), Buffer, Hootsuite, etc.

You'll be in Great Company

Shareaholic has been in business since 2009 and is trusted by hundreds of thousands of websites (small and large). Featured by the New York Times, MIT Technology Review, The Washington Post, The BBC, TechCrunch, Forbes, Entrepreneur...
